[00:00.42]As I'm getting older, chip up on my shoulder
[00:05.11]Rolling through life, to roll over and die
[00:09.97]Lalalalala, lalalalala, lalalalala, oh oh oh
[00:19.44]Missing hippy Jon, salad days are gone
[00:24.27]Remembering things just to tell 'em so long
[00:29.07]Lalalalala, lalalalala, lalalalala, oh oh oh
[00:38.88]Oh mama, actin' like my life's already over
[00:48.34]Oh dear, act your age and try another year
[01:00.28]Always feeling tired, smiling when required
[01:04.72]Write another year off and kindly resign
